Action.Title: Vikram
Action.Actors: Kamal Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Fahadh Faasil
Action.Plot: A special investigator discovers a case of serial killings is not what it seems to be, and leading down this path is only going to end in a war between everyone involved.

Action.Title: Vikram Vedha
Action.Plot: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

Action.Title: Jailer
Action.Plot: A retired jailer goes on a manhunt to find his son's killers. But the road leads him to a familiar, albeit a bit darker place. Can he emerge from this complex situation successfully?

Action.Title: Leo
Action.Writer: Lokesh Kanagaraj, Rathna Kumar, Deeraj Vaidy
Action.Actors: Joseph Vijay, Sanjay Dutt, Trisha Krishnan
Action.Plot: Parthiban is a mild-mannered cafe owner who fends off a gang of murderous thugs and gains attention from a drug cartel claiming he was once a part of them.

Action.Title: Vettaiyan
Action.Plot: Ruthless criminal activity is met with force from a maverick police officer with a disregard for the rules as he confronts an outbreak of lawlessness.

Action.Title: Amaran
Action.Plot: The life of Major Mukund Varadarajan and is set against the backdrop of the Qazipathri Operation in Shopian, Kashmir, which took place back in 2014.

Action.Title: Raayan
Action.Plot: A series of unfortunate events lead Raayan, a simpleton to be dragged into the dreaded world of crime and manipulation.

Action.Title: Maamannan
Action.Plot: The community that was exploited by the town's influential man, who completely rules due to the powerful backing of the authorities. A man collects evidence to flip him upside down when he was helpless to stop his endless torture.

Comedy.Title: Don
Comedy.Plot: Follows the life of a youngster from college to his marriage.

Comedy.Title: Kalakalappu
Comedy.Plot: A man struggles to save his family-owned restaurant as it is running in loses. He soon falls for a health inspector keen on shutting down the place. When his brother enters the scene, things get worse.

Comedy.Title: Kalakalappu 2
Comedy.Plot: A two and a half hours fun ride in which two groups fights for laptop and money suitcase and when siva enters things get even more funny.

Comedy.Title: Soodhu Kavvum
Comedy.Writer: Srinivas Kavinayam, Srinivasa Kavineyam, Nalan Kumarasamy
Comedy.Actors: Vijay Sethupathi, Sanchita Shetty, Radha Ravi
Comedy.Plot: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

Comedy.Title: Comali
Comedy.Actors: Jayam Ravi, Kajal Aggarwal, Yogi Babu
Comedy.Plot: A youngster in his mid-30s goes through a series of struggles after coming to terms with the fact that he was in coma for 16 years.

Horror.Title: Aranmanai
Horror.Writer: Sundar C., S.B. Ramadas, Venkat Raghavan
Horror.Plot: A large family returns to an ancestral property (palace) to sell it off. Meanwhile they discover some supernatural elements in the palace.

Horror.Title: Aranmanai 2
Horror.Writer: Sundar C., Venkat Raghavan, S.B. Ramadas
Horror.Plot: Murali returns to his ancestral palace along with his fiancee as his father lands in a coma under mysterious circumstances. However, his life takes a turn when he uncovers dark secrets of his family.

Horror.Title: Aranmanai 3
Horror.Writer: Sundar C., Rishabh Purohit, Venkat Raghavan
Horror.Plot: The ghost of a wronged mother tries to take revenge on a Zamindar and his daughter, but one man stands in its way!

Horror.Title: Aranmanai 4
Horror.Writer: Sundar C., Shivgopal Krishna, Venkat Raghavan
Horror.Actors: Sundar C., Tamannaah Bhatia, Raashi Khanna
Horror.Plot: After his sister's suspicious death, a man decides to discover the hidden truth, setting off a chasm for chaos and terror.

Horror.Title: Demonte Colony
Horror.Plot: After consuming liquor, four friends decide to do something interesting and visit a haunted bungalow. However, they do not realize that they have returned home with an evil spirit.

Horror.Title: Demonte Colony 2
Horror.Plot: A group of friends who return to a cursed location, driven by curiosity and the quest to uncover the truth behind the malevolent spirits that reside there.
